tasks.task: Construct a barrel tumbler for making T13 seasoning
subtasks: Weld the base structure of the tumbler
Drill holes for pillow block bearings
Assemble the basket to hold the barrel
Weld axles onto the tumbler structure
Add sides to the basket for barrel retention
Align and attach uprights using a fireball tool square
Test the fit and function of the assembled tumbler
Weld top bar hinges for opening and closing the tumbler
Attach an end cap for latch mechanisms
Add crossmembers with flanges to prevent upright bowing
Position pads to reduce internal movement
Install a sprocket and counterweight system
Upgrade the motor to handle the barrel's weight
Construct a motor mount for proper chain tension
Conduct a test run with the motor and seasoned barrel
